title: Summer of Making 2025 Begins!
description: The official kickoff of SOM 2025. Hundreds of makers from around the world gather to build, create, and earn shells.

title: First Project Shipped!
description: Orpheus ships the AI Dinosaur Assistant - combining dinosaurs and code in the most Orpheus way possible.

title: First Maker Hits 100 Shells!
description: CodeCrusader becomes the first maker to earn 100 shells through consistent project work.

title: Real-time Collaborative Code Editor Launched
description: CodeCrusader ships a Google Docs-style editor for code. The community immediately starts using it to pair program.

title: Week 1 Recap: 50 Projects Shipped!
description: The first week ends with incredible momentum. 50 projects shipped, 10,000+ hours logged, and 75,000 shells earned.

title: Generative Art NFT Marketplace Goes Live
description: PixelPioneer launches a platform for creating and trading algorithmic art as NFTs.

title: First Hardware Hero Badge Earned!
description: ByteBandit earns the Hardware Hero badge after completing their third hardware project - a smart home dashboard.

title: Shell Shop Opens for Business!
description: The community-requested Shell Shop launches with hardware, swag, and software licenses. Makers can now spend their hard-earned shells.

title: DIY Smart Home Dashboard Completed
description: ByteBandit completes their Arduino-powered smart home system. Custom PCB and all!

title: First Shell Shop Purchase!
description: A maker purchases a Raspberry Pi 5 with shells. The economy is officially working!

title: ML-Powered Recipe Recommender Ships
description: ScriptSorcerer's FridgeChef uses computer vision and ML to recommend recipes based on ingredients.

title: Month 1 Complete: The Numbers Are Wild
description: 150 projects shipped, 50,000+ hours worked, 500,000 shells earned. The community is thriving!

title: Shell Economy Simulator Released
description: Orpheus creates a tool to track shell inflation and whale movements. Turns out shells do experience inflation!

title: First Maker Hits 1,000 Shells!
description: Orpheus crosses the 1,000 shell milestone. The grind is real!

title: Markdown Presentation Tool Launched
description: CodeCrusader's SlidesMD makes beautiful presentations from Markdown. PowerPoint is officially dead.

title: Overachiever Badge Unlocked!
description: Orpheus becomes the first to earn the legendary Overachiever badge for earning 10,000+ shells.

title: CSS Animation Playground Released
description: PixelPioneer's visual CSS animation editor makes creating animations actually fun.

title: ⚡ Community Challenge: Build in 24 Hours!
description: A special 24-hour sprint challenge. Extra shells for completed projects!

title: 24-Hour Challenge: 89 Projects Shipped!
description: The community goes absolutely wild. 89 projects shipped in 24 hours. Makers don't sleep!

title: SLOTS Shell Casino Opens!
description: The virtual casino is here! Put your shells on the line in slots, roulette, and more. (It's all simulated, don't worry.)

title: First Casino Jackpot Hit!
description: A lucky maker wins 5,000 virtual shells on the slot machine. The casino economy is born.

title: Final Week of Summer of Making!
description: The final push begins. Makers rush to complete their projects and earn those last shells.

title: Orpheus Hits 10,000 Shells!
description: The shell legend reaches 10k shells. The community celebrates with digital confetti.

title: Summer of Making 2025 Wraps Up!
description: The official end of SOM 2025. 300+ projects, 100,000+ hours, 2 million+ shells. What a summer!
